summary: Node 14 and 18 support was disabled in CI for the npm init verdaccio test. This issue tracks re-enabling the broken test and adding these Node versions to the CI matrix.
userImpact: Node 14 and 18 compatibility is not being tested in CI, potentially missing compatibility issues for SDK users.
rootCause: Test was disabled in #385 and needs Node 14 and 18 added to the CI matrix to re-enable it.
proposedFix: Add node 14 and 18 to the matrix for test-npm-init in .github/workflows/ci.yml
resolutionDetails: Completed in #1003 which added the required Node versions to the CI matrix.
keyQuote: Need to add node 14 and 18 to the matrix for test-npm-init
